languages.text: "Постарайтесь захотеть в ближайшее время. Чем дольше мы летим, тем дольше преступники остаются вне досягаемости правосудия Императора". {n}Проктор Антар кивает вам, быстро отдает честь и вместе с Глейто покидает мостик.{/n}

"I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Постарайтесь захотеть в ближайшее время. Чем дольше мы летим, тем дольше преступники остаются вне досягаемости правосудия Императора". {n}Проктор Антар кивает вам, быстро отдает честь и вместе с Глейто покидает мостик.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I hope that permission comes soon. The longer our journey, the more criminals are left without my oversight." {n}Solomorne nods to you, gives a quick salute, then leaves with Glaito in tow.{/n}

"I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

"I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

"I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the more criminals are left wandering about without my supervision." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

languages.text: «Espero que esas circunstancias se den pronto. Cuanto más largo sea nuestro viaje, más tiempo escapan los criminales de la justicia del Emperador». {n}Solomorne se despide con un gesto de cabeza y un rápido saludo militar y se marcha, seguido de Glaito.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Espero que esas circunstancias se den pronto. Cuanto más largo sea nuestro viaje, más tiempo escapan los criminales de la justicia del Emperador». {n}Solomorne se despide con un gesto de cabeza y un rápido saludo militar y se marcha, seguido de Glaito.{/n}

«Espero que esas circunstancias se den pronto. Cuanto más largo sea nuestro viaje, más criminales campan a sus anchas sin mi supervisión». {n}Solomorne se despide con un gesto de cabeza y un rápido saludo militar y se marcha, seguido de Glaito.{/n}

«Espero que esas circunstancias se den pronto. Cuanto más largo sea nuestro viaje, más criminales campan a sus anchas sin mi supervisión». {n}Solomorne se despide con un gesto de cabeza y un rápido saludo militar y se marcha, seguido de Glaito.{/n}

languages.text: “希望合适的时机尽快到来。我们这趟旅程离开得越久，那些罪犯逍遥法外的时间就越长。”{n}索罗蒙向你点了点头，快速行了个礼，离开了。格雷托跟在他身后走了出去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “希望合适的时机尽快到来。我们这趟旅程离开得越久，那些罪犯逍遥法外的时间就越长。”{n}索罗蒙向你点了点头，快速行了个礼，离开了。格雷托跟在他身后走了出去。{/n}
“希望合适的时机尽快到来。我们离开得越久，不受我监管的罪犯就会越多。”{n}索罗蒙向你点了点头，快速行了个礼，离开了。格雷托跟在他身后走了出去。{/n}
“希望合适的时机尽快到来。我们离开得越久，不受我监管的罪犯就会越多。”{n}索罗蒙向你点了点头，快速行了个礼，离开了。格雷托跟在他身后走了出去。{/n}

languages.text: « Le plus tôt sera le mieux. Plus notre voyage se prolongera, plus les criminels pourront échapper longtemps à la justice de l'Empereur. {n}Solomorne vous adresse un bref salut de la tête avant de prendre congé, Glaito sur les talons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le plus tôt sera le mieux. Plus notre voyage se prolongera, plus les criminels pourront échapper longtemps à la justice de l'Empereur. {n}Solomorne vous adresse un bref salut de la tête avant de prendre congé, Glaito sur les talons.{/n}

« Le plus tôt sera le mieux. Plus mon absence se prolongera, plus nombreux seront les criminels à en profiter pour sévir en toute impunité. » {n}Solomorne vous adresse un bref salut de la tête avant de prendre congé, Glaito sur les talons.{/n}

« Le plus tôt sera le mieux. Plus mon absence se prolongera, plus nombreux seront les criminels à en profiter pour sévir en toute impunité. » {n}Solomorne vous adresse un bref salut de la tête avant de prendre congé, Glaito sur les talons.{/n}

languages.text: 「その時が早く訪れることを願っています。旅が長くなればなるほど、犯罪者たちは皇帝陛下の正義の手の届かないところに居続けることになりますから」{n}ソロモーンはあなたにうなずき、素早く敬礼すると、グライトを連れてその場を後にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その時が早く訪れることを願っています。旅が長くなればなるほど、犯罪者たちは皇帝陛下の正義の手の届かないところに居続けることになりますから」{n}ソロモーンはあなたにうなずき、素早く敬礼すると、グライトを連れてその場を後にした。{/n}
「こうした状況がすぐに訪れることを望みます。旅が長くなればなるほど、より多くの犯罪者が私の監督なしでさまよい歩くことになるでしょう」{n}ソロモーンはあなたにうなずき、素早い敬礼を与え、グライトが彼のすぐあとに続いて去る。{/n}
「こうした状況がすぐに訪れることを望みます。旅が長くなればなるほど、より多くの犯罪者が私の監督なしでさまよい歩くことになるでしょう」{n}ソロモーンはあなたにうなずき、素早い敬礼を与え、グライトが彼のすぐあとに続いて去る。{/n}

languages.text: "Umarım şartlar en yakın zamanda elverir. Yolculuğumuz uzadıkça İmparator'un adaletini ulaştıramadığım suçlular serbestçe ortalıkta dolaşmaya devam edecek." {n}Solomorne seni başıyla selamlıyor ve Glaito'yu da ardına takıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Umarım şartlar en yakın zamanda elverir. Yolculuğumuz uzadıkça İmparator'un adaletini ulaştıramadığım suçlular serbestçe ortalıkta dolaşmaya devam edecek." {n}Solomorne seni başıyla selamlıyor ve Glaito'yu da ardına takıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}

"Umarım şartlar en yakın zamanda elverir. Yolculuğumuz uzadıkça nezaretimin yokluğunda daha çok suçlu serbestçe ortalıkta dolaşacak." {n}Solomorne seni başıyla selamlıyor ve Glaito'yu da ardına takıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}

"Umarım şartlar en yakın zamanda elverir. Yolculuğumuz uzadıkça nezaretimin yokluğunda daha çok suçlu serbestçe ortalıkta dolaşacak." {n}Solomorne seni başıyla selamlıyor ve Glaito'yu da ardına takıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, diese Umstände treten bald ein. Je länger unsere Reise dauert, desto länger entziehen sich die Kriminellen der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators." {n}Solomorne nickt dir zu, salutiert und wendet sich mit Glaito im Schlepptau ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope those circumstances arrive soon. The longer our journey, the longer the criminals remain outside the reach of the Emperor's justice." {n}Solomorne nods at you, gives a quick salute, and leaves with Glaito at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, diese Umstände treten bald ein. Je länger unsere Reise dauert, desto länger entziehen sich die Kriminellen der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators." {n}Solomorne nickt dir zu, salutiert und wendet sich mit Glaito im Schlepptau ab.{/n}

"Ich hoffe, diese Umstände treten bald ein. Je länger unsere Reise dauert, desto mehr Kriminelle entziehen sich meiner Überwachung." {n}Solomorne nickt dir zu, salutiert und wendet sich mit Glaito im Schlepptau ab.{/n}
